description: BUSH TO UNVEIL TAX PLAN NEXT WEEK. Republican presidential candidate Jeb Bush told an audience in New Hampshire on Thursday that he will unveil his tax plan next Wednesday. CNN reports that Bush will make the announcement in a speech at manufacturer Morris & Associates in Garner, N.C. “While he didn’t unveil specific details about his plan, he said […]
title: Bush to announce tax plan next week, Rubio opposes bankruptcy for Puerto Rico and the unemployment rate falls to 5.1 percent
